description: Verify whether two faces belong to a same person or whether one face belongs to a person.Remarks:* Higher face image quality means better identification precision. Please consider high-quality faces: frontal, clear, and face size is 200x200 pixels (100 pixels between eyes) or bigger.* For the scenarios that are sensitive to accuracy please make your own judgment.* The 'recognitionModel' associated with the query faces' faceIds should be the same as the 'recognitionModel' used by the target face, person group or large person group.

faceid1.description: FaceId of the first face, comes from Face - Detect

faceid2.description: FaceId of the second face, comes from Face - Detect

body.description: Request body for face to face verification.
